channel.title: How to remove these '_' underscores and EDIT the Questab
channel.description: Photo explains alot, but I just need them off and if someone could make it so the ID's of game was on the right side of a click also.. also how do I add a custom tab? like time online? server time online? pkpoints.. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/14ne6vq.png[/img]

item.title: How to remove these '_' underscores and EDIT the Questab
item.dc:creator: @Wenis_Tree Wenis Tree
item.description:
@Wenis_Tree wrote:

for quest tab add this in client.java server sided under

[code]/* Quest Tab */
getPA().sendFrame126(“Server Name”, 640); // Quest Tab
getPA().sendFrame126("", 633);
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online."+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ “”, 663);
